name: NextPlugins WooCommerce Ask Question Tab
author: NextPlugins

sections.description:
Ask question tab with mail form for WooCommerce product page.

** WooCommerce tested up to: 7.4 **

Plugin include three templates:
Default – for WordPress official themes
Bootstrap – for themes built with bootstrap
Storefront – for Storefront theme

Installation:

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Go to WooCommerce -> Settings -> Ask Question Tab -> Enable -> Save
sections.changelog:
1.0.4

  • Test WordPress 6.1 compatibility
  • Test WooCommerce 7.4 compatibility
  • Fix localization strings
  • Add template filter

1.0.3

  • Test WordPress 5.2 compatibility

1.0.1

  • Add option to override templates (load from theme)

1.0.0

  • First version.

short_description: Adds ask question tab to WooCommerce product page.
